entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Huntsville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:58 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 04:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.9°C
Pressure: 98.4 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -11.0°C
Wind: SSW 32 km/h gust 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow this morning and early this afternoon. Local amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
